Properties.commandText:
SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[Cost], [p].[Description], [p].[Name], [i].[Id], [i].[ProductId], [i].[Url]
FROM [Products] AS [p]
LEFT JOIN [Image] AS [i] ON [p].[Id] = [i].[ProductId]
ORDER BY [p].[Id], [i].[Id]
